> I see sleepless nights ahead.. Allrighty, we'll keep all that in 
mind while planning our course of action from here on. I think we'll 
get the whole thing compiling first (maybe after replacing the 
assembly), then go from there.

One request: as soon as you finish getting it compiled the first time, 
could you produce a version of Gladiator that has cheat codes disabled 
for the Gladiator tournament and have the save game file altered so 
that it would be possible to determine that the player was using the 
version with cheat codes disabled?
